thread.title: BREAKING: I did not endorse Sheriff, says Jonathan - Punch Newspapers
thread.title_full: BREAKING: I did not endorse Sheriff, says Jonathan - Punch Newspapers

title: BREAKING: I did not endorse Sheriff, says Jonathan - Punch Newspapers
text: Tweet By Olusola Fabiyi, Abuja Former President Goodluck Jonathan on Tuesday said he did not endorse Senator Ali Modu Sheriff as the national chairman of the Peoples Democratic Party. He said he merely opened his doors to Sheriff and other members of his entourage when they visited him at his residence in Abuja on Monday . The former governor of Borno State was at Jonathanâ€™s residence to discuss the outcome of the Court of Appeal judgement, which on Friday , affirmed him as the national chairman of the party. Details later
